    • Constructor Detail

      • Settings

        public Settings()
        Default constructor for the settings class. Only called if no previous settings exist. Settings from a current session are stored in a custom serialized file labelled 'settings.config'. Sets all to default.

    • Method Detail

      • saveSettings

        public void saveSettings()
                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Saves all the current parameters into 'settings.config' for future reference.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
